name: Towerprot
description: Towerprot is a strategic game in which players build and position their defenders to protect their base from enemy attacks. The player earns coins to build and upgrade the defenders to defeat enemies that come at the base in waves. The game features a variety of defenders with different abilities and strengths, as well as different types of enemies with different weaknesses and strengths. The player must carefully plan their strategy and placement of defenders to provide the best defence and protect the base from enemy attacks.
